adr_address: 2 Rue Scribe, 75009 Paris, France

editorial_summary.overview: Lavish lodging with opera house views & a renowned restaurant, plus a spa & a fitness room.

name: InterContinental Paris - Le Grand by IHG

reviews.text:
I popped in for lunch knowing I would not be disappointed.  Although I showed up without a reservation, they found me a very nice, centrally located table with a view.
The service, menu and ordered food was fantastic, and exceeded my previous experience.  The restaurant, Cafe de la Paix, lives up to its reputation, and the decor served to impress.  A perfect place to lunch in the middle of the touristic area to escape the noise and enjoy a true Parisian experience, without the rude waiters - .

“The hotel service was truly outstanding, but what impressed me the most was the exceptional work of the housekeeping staff. The rooms were cleaned with great care almost throughout the entire day, and the level of cleanliness was simply excellent. I haven’t seen this kind of precision and dedication in years, especially in Europe.

What deserves even more recognition is their honesty. We never lost a single thing during our stay. Even when we accidentally left valuable items in the room, we always returned to find everything perfectly arranged, as if it were their own home. Their honesty and kindness are truly remarkable, and I believe they deserve special thanks for their hard work.

I sincerely thank all the cleaning staff in particular🙏🏻✨🤍 and all the receptionist staff too 👌🏻🙏🏻🤍

Overall, we really enjoyed our stay. The professionalism, integrity, and respectful attitude of all the employees made the experience even better. And I can honestly say that we did not face any form of discrimination, which made us feel comfortable and welcomed.

✨ Housekeeping staff are truly the unsung heroes of this hotel, and they deserve all the credit✨

Very nice hotel with a great location and helpful staff. The renovated rooms are spacious, modern, and very comfortable, and the views are truly amazing. We really enjoyed our stay overall. Room dining was also excellent — the lamb curry was especially delicious.

On the downside, housekeeping service was a bit slow. It took two days before anyone came to collect my laundry, and when I requested someone to fix the AC, they said they would, but no one ever came. Unfortunately, the AC stayed hot throughout my stay.

Overall, a very good experience with just some improvements needed in housekeeping responsiveness.

Thank you for making our stay in Paris wonderful.

We have been to many intercontinental hotels around the world and Intercontinental Paris Le Grand is currently at the joint favourite for us - along side Intercontinental Tokyo bay (although theyre very different in styles)

The property here is absolutely stunning from decorations to management with cleaning routines etc. Really appreciated the housekeeping for their efforts here - it's not easy to maintain a property like this.

Food in the club lounge is amazing especially the pastries and desserts. The only thing that could be improved in my view is the personalized service at the lounge - something like table service or saying hi using guest names etc

Overall we already really enjoyed our stay. We will be back next time we are in Paris.

If you're reading this review and still hesitates to stay here, don't think further just try staying here - it's very nice.

I loved this hotel for many reasons.  It is beautifully maintained, has a great breakfast buffet and restaurant for lunch or dinner. The room was comfortable, clean and safe.  I traveled with a friend so we got the slightly larger room with twin beds. Beds were comfortable and large enough for an adult with comfortable mattress and pillows.   There are somethings that take a little getting use to (like the smaller size showers and the light switch controls ) but that didn't really spoil the experience.  The room service was very responsive to our need for a larger mirror in the room, towels etc, but if you need a wake up call better think twice, we never got ours.  Overall the stay was excellent, the concierge was very helpful, the reception courteous and Paris Intercontinental Le Gran lived up to its reputation it was Gran!

vicinity: The Westin Paris - Vendôme, 2 Rue Scribe, Paris
